name: Crawler (Master Krepta)
description:
Made for One Game a Month Game Jam - October 2016

This is a small exploration game, mainly a test to see if i could develop wall crawling game mechanics. Play as a spider in a house, cling to walls, eat ants.

Controls:

WASD for movement

Space for jump

Left Mouse - shoot web to fly towards a wall, sticking when you arrive.

Right mouse - Attack Ants

Music Credit

"This House" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
